Class ReadMessagesTest

java.lang.Object
database.BaseDatabaseTest
database.tests.ReadMessagesTest
@TestMethodOrder(org.junit.jupiter.api.MethodOrderer.OrderAnnotation.class) public class ReadMessagesTest extends BaseDatabaseTest
Unit tests for the ReadMessages repository.

This test class verifies various operations related to marking messages as read or unread, including single and batch updates, and querying read messages for a specific user.

It interacts with the Users and Questions repositories to ensure messages are created, read status is updated, and queries return expected results.

Author:
Dhruv
